text:
@peltzmadeline Your top demographic, 55+, are definitely mourning the loss of a friend(s) to #COVID19 , @seanhannity , and maybe are finally noticing how full of shit you are...

If you keep aiding & abetting the deaths of your audience, who will be left to support your show, network, the GOP?
